title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
description: Complete overhaul of the existing online store interface to improve user experience (UX) and conversion rates. Focus on mobile responsiveness and simplified checkout process.

title: Internal CRM System Upgrade
description: Migrate the legacy Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system to a cloud-based solution. Includes data cleanup and integration with marketing automation tools.

title: Q3 Financial Reporting Automation
description: Develop scripts and dashboards to automatically generate quarterly financial reports, reducing manual data entry time by 50%.

title: Mobile App Beta Testing Program
description: Recruit and manage 100 external beta testers for the new Android and iOS application features. Collect and analyze feedback.

title: Corporate Website Security Audit
description: Comprehensive security audit of the main company website. Implement necessary patches to address cross-site scripting (XSS) and SQL injection vulnerabilities.

title: API Documentation Enhancement
description: Improve clarity and completeness of the public-facing API documentation. Add code examples for Python and JavaScript consumers.

title: Data Backup and Recovery Strategy
description: Review and update the disaster recovery plan. Test automated daily backups for all critical databases and file storage.

title: Office Layout Optimization
description: Analyze current office space usage and propose a new layout to improve team collaboration and reduce noise levels.

title: Client Feedback Collection System
description: Implement a new automated system for collecting feedback immediately after project completion. Integrate with the support ticket system.
